name: Melinda's Hunt
description:
It's time to save Melinda's kingdom and her people!

The neighbouring King of Britzland has sieged war on Melinda's kingdom  when her father, King Brandon, is away. It's time for Melinda to assume her role as the warrior princess, to save her land and people!

Can you help Melinda in her quest?

Test your swiftness with arrows as you face strong enemies. Press space to attack and click on the desired location to change direction of attack.

How far can you really go?
